junior.translation[0].definitions[0].def: having a low rank in an organization or profession
junior.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: There are several people junior to me  (=with a lower rank than me).
junior.translation[0].definitions[1].def: relating to sport for young people below a particular age
junior.translation[0].definitions[2].def: relating to a school for children below the age of 11
junior.translation[0].definitions[3].def: relating to the year before the final year of high school or college
junior.translation[0].definitions[3].exa: the second semester of my junior year
junior.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a young person who takes part in sport for people below a particular age
junior.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: The juniors use the courts on Tuesday night.
junior.translation[1].definitions[1].def: someone who has a low rank in an organization or profession
junior.translation[1].definitions[2].def: a child who goes to a junior school
junior.translation[1].definitions[3].def: a student in the year before the final year of high school or college
junior.translation[2].definitions[0].def: a name used humorously when speaking to or about a boy or a younger man, especially your son
junior.translation[3].definitions[0].def: used after the name of a man or boy who has the same name as his father
junior.translation[4].definitions[0].def: used after the name of a man who has the same name as his father, especially in the US
junior.translation[5].definitions[0].def: having a low or lower rank in an organization or a profession
junior.translation[5].definitions[0].exa: Barron had refused to talk to anyone junior to Wickham.
Some junior employees might lack the courage to approach the boss.
junior.translation[5].definitions[1].def: a junior bond, debt etc will be repaid later or have a smaller part repaid than other bonds, debts etc, if the borrower is unable to repay everything
junior.translation[5].definitions[1].exa: The new bonds offered by Trump Plaza Associates were junior to the old ones.
junior.translation[6].definitions[0].def: someone who has a low rank in an organization or profession
junior.translation[6].definitions[0].exa: They treated her like a junior.
